text: Peter Joseph D'Alonzo (May 26, 1929 – December 27, 2001) was an American football fullback who played two seasons with the Detroit Lions of the National Football League (NFL). He was drafted by the Lions in the fourth round of the 1951 NFL Draft. He played college football at Villanova University and attended Orange High School in Orange, New Jersey. ==References== ==External links== *Just Sports Stats Category:1929 births Category:2001 deaths Category:Players of American football from New Jersey Category:American football fullbacks Category:Villanova Wildcats football players Category:Detroit Lions players Category:People from Orange, New Jersey
title: Pete D'Alonzo
